files.patch:
@@ -1868,1 +1868,1 @@
-          "Use a combination of -XX:+DTraceMethodProbes, "                  \
+          "Use the combination of -XX:+DTraceMethodProbes, "                \

@@ -2978,1 +2978,1 @@
-Enable dtrace probes for object allocation.
+\f[B]Linux and macOS:\f[R] Enable dtrace probes for object allocation.
@@ -2983,1 +2983,1 @@
-Enable dtrace probes for method-entry and method-exit.
+\f[B]Linux and macOS:\f[R] Enable dtrace probes for method-entry and method-exit.
@@ -2988,1 +2988,1 @@
-Enable dtrace probes for monitor events.
+\f[B]Linux and macOS:\f[R] Enable dtrace probes for monitor events.
@@ -4017,1 +4017,1 @@
-that affect the performance.
+that affect performance.
@@ -4020,1 +4020,1 @@
-Use the combination of these flags instead: -XX:+DTraceMethodProbes, -XX:+DTraceAllocProbes, -XX:+DTraceMonitorProbes
+Use the combination of these flags instead: \f[CB]\-XX:+DTraceMethodProbes\f[R], \f[CB]\-XX:+DTraceAllocProbes\f[R], \f[CB]\-XX:+DTraceMonitorProbes\f[R].
